meanings.definition: An apparatus using mechanical power and having several parts, each with a definite function and together performing a particular task.
meanings.sent1: The factory had a large machine that made boxes all day.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather fixed the broken machine in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat jumped on the machine and accidentally turned it on.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a well-oiled machine, solving problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The machine hummed rhythmically, filling the room with a sense of productivity.

meanings.definition: A device that transmits or modifies force or motion.
meanings.sent1: The pulley system acted as a machine to lift the heavy load.
meanings.sent2: The gears in the clockwork machine turned smoothly, keeping time accurately.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child used the machine to launch a toy across the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a machine, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed against the shore like a relentless machine, eroding the sand.
